website_summaries.verdict: Not only do these bamboo wipes break down faster than others on our list, but they're also crammed with nourishing, natural ingredients to care for delicate skin.
pros: Bamboo construction is soft yet sturdy
Biodegradable in as little as 21 days
Soothes, nourishes, and cleanses skin with organic aloe vera, chamomile, tea tree oil, and lavender oil
Great balance of moisture and absorbency
cons: A bit thin, but sturdy, nevertheless

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are super soft and feel great. Not hard to take out of the packaging. And the packs are really big. 80 wipes per package. The wipes themselves are big, but I don't use them for a baby, I use them on myself. So I just tear one in half and put the other half back in the package, make it last twice as long haha. 6 come in each box. It will take me a while to get through them so I'll be gifting them for sure. LOVE that they're biodegradable AND body friendly. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: love this wipes, the best
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, is soft, strong, perfect moisture, good smell, my favorite. I have tried water wipes, honest, seven generation, pampers, Costco's brand Kirkland and I totally love this one, sadly is currently unavailable, hopefully I'm able to buy again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mariza

customer_reviews.title: Soft and gentle
customer_reviews.text: Lets face it adults need these sometimes to. These are soft and very gentle, love them! Especially when wet wipes are so hard to find now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soft, functional wipe that comes out of the box easily!
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping around for an eco-friendly wipe that smells good, is soft, and doesn't cause irritation for months. These are winners. As a bonus, they easily come out of the box! This put them above Naty brand for me, my other favorite, because Naty all only dispense in a giant mass.
customer_reviews.author: Marian H.

customer_reviews.title: Clean sent
customer_reviews.text: The sent is a bit strong, which is great for really stinky poos. Wish there was more wipes per pack/ larger individual packs just for plastic saving purposes. I love the closures.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are really good!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are really good, especially for being 100% bamboo. They aren't super wet like other brands we were using, but work great! You do have to unfold the last third after you pull one out. The packaging is still plastic with a hard plastic flip top opening. They are still one step closer to a more responsible disposable wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Butt wipes for a better world.
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I don't think the package is as eco friendly as the product. The tissues themself are great. I have sensitive skin and have not had any issue.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for your family, and your planet!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, most eco friendly wipes I have found. They even biodegrade in 21 days! They never dry out my little ones skin, and smell nice and neutral. 👍🏻 highly suggest for new parents!!
customer_reviews.author: The Glossons

customer_reviews.title: Eco friendly-ish
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they’re eco friendly. Was disappointed that they’re shipped with so much plastic, in addition to the plastic dispensers. Kinda defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Gentle
customer_reviews.text: I loved how soft these wipes are, extra gentle as well. I feel like they aren't harmful like other brands can be. They do the job and don't like burn the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Really love these wipes. I feel happy to use something without all the toxic chemicals on my babies. Great price, worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Barker

customer_reviews.title: Too much fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This product had a lot of "natural" language. Made me think it would be appropriate for people who prefer more natural type products. These wipes reek of perfume which is not necessary because they already have some essential oils, yet "parfum" is still in the ingredients. Plus is that the packaging is well made and will keep these wipes moist. The closure clicks shut securely as opposed to the cheaper sticky closures.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Meccariello

customer_reviews.title: Earth approved
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin. Nice light clean scent. And compostable!!
customer_reviews.author: hello

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They smell really good and are very soft. I use these for myself. Came really moistened, don’t dry out in the packaging. Happy to know they’re made of organic material. Would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Persephone

customer_reviews.title: Love These Wipes
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great. We've been using them for 3 months now. The scent is pleasant but not overpowering. Love that they are biodegradable yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Moglia

customer_reviews.title: Strong Perfume Smell is Unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: These really do smell like parfum and not just natural ingredients. I really wanted to use bamboo wipes with our bamboo diapers for overnight (we use cloth during the day) but these smell too strong and burned/itched when I tried then on my own skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Ample-sized baby wipe!
customer_reviews.text: These baby wipes are a good size, extremely soft, and have a nice, fresh/clean scent of lavender. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele N.

customer_reviews.title: i like them
customer_reviews.text: I use them for my dog and he likes them. they don't irritate him. I'm glad they are environmentally friendly .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: I wanted more of the scent of the natural oils used but that's the only reason to dock a star otherwise good for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I like this wipes except only one thing
customer_reviews.text: I like this wipes except only one thing. Wipe quality is perfect for me and my baby but it's dispensing is horrible. It is always dispensed 2 or 3 wipes together or fails to dispense. When you are busy, this is horrible -_-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Fragrant!
customer_reviews.text: Way too fragrant. The last ingredient on the list is “fragrance” which is too vague for me. We really dislike the scent anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Has Been using for 7 months now. Love the smell and quality. No bad chemicals here
customer_reviews.author: Richard MAddox

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I contemplated for a long time before paying the extra few dollars to purchase these since the wipes I usually purchase (Amazon) were unavailable. I don't have a baby. I use wipes for everything for myself (especially my hands). Decision made because of the reviews (even bad ones). Combined I knew I these wipes would be a good fit for me!
customer_reviews.author: Bellia_Ellemanae

customer_reviews.title: Scented
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize these are scented. Lavender and tea tree oil are endocrine disruptors and I dont think it's smart to use either around a baby and especially not use them on their genitals. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Biodegradable and tough on mess
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use wonderful for my child and wonderful for the planet. I wish their packaging was made out of eco materials but this is already an awesome start to ending our dependance on plastics in everything we touch and let our little ones touch. Bamboo is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Big apple mom and dancer

customer_reviews.title: Rashes
customer_reviews.text: Gave my daughter many rashes. Don’t think it was working as well. Went back to Naty wipes.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes! They are durable, have a light clean scent and best of all are sensitive enough for baby skin and are biodegradable and eco-friendly 👍
customer_reviews.author: Pfeifer C

customer_reviews.title: ... work as well as Mustela wipes and expected a better scent but it does the job and 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as well as Mustela wipes and expected a better scent but it does the job and 5 stars for the biodegradable composition!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have not found any wipes that we like more. They smell amazing and are even great for my daughter who has very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle wipes
customer_reviews.text: We love this product ! Gentle for baby bottoms and nice scent too!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Owens

customer_reviews.title: They Have an Extremely Strong Smell
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write bad reviews but since this is a product for babies i felt obligated to. I am not sure how this product can be natural if it has such strong smell. I literally could not breathe every time I took one of these wipes out of the package. Its smell it’s terribly strong. I am not sure how this can labeled as “natural” and can be “recommended” for babies. And don’t even get me started on how dry they are compared to other brands. This pricey wipes are not worth the money and more importantly should not be labeled as “natural” with such strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Janeth

customer_reviews.title: Good product a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: These feel great like they really are organic without the crap. Don't pull out very easily but that's okay. Problem is they are overpriced. But still a good product
customer_reviews.author: Adelle ❤️

product_meta.title: Aleva Naturals Bamboo Baby Wipes | Perfect for Sensitive Skin | Extra Strong and Ultra Soft | Natural and Organic Ingredients | Certified Vegan | 6 packs of 80ct – Total of 480ct (37944)
product_meta.description: Size:480ct| Color:OriginalThese ultra-soft, extra-strong wipes not only leave baby's face, body, and diaper area feeling silky-smooth, they give you the peace of mind that you are not triggering eczema or irritating sensitive skin.
feature_bullets: Made from 100% Rayon from Bamboo which is extra-strong and ultra-soft
Perfect for diaper changes and more
Extra strong & ultra soft wipes and extra large wipes
Formulated specifically for sensitive skin and babies with eczema in mind
Gentle blend of organic aloe vera, chamomile, natural tea tree oil, and lavender essential oils gently cleanses, soothes, and leaves your baby's skin feeling soft, supple and silky smooth
Free of all harsh chemicals, including parabens, phthalates, phenoxyethanol, chlorine, dyes, and other chemicals that can trigger rashes and skin irritation

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
